answers.text:
Gary, yes, there are really two options.  You can simply create an open group from within the Groups tab.  Then distribute the group link to folks that you know that would be interested.  You can also send invites from within the KN.  Others just trolling the groups could also join an open group freely.
Another option for your group would be the branded idea that you and I discussed by phone a few months back.  We could actually house the KN in the look and feel of your current website.  Some additional discussion would be required if you are still interested in pursuing that option.
